00023 #include <PrecondA.h>
00024 #include <Matrice_Morse_Sym.h>
00025 #include <Matrice_Bloc_Sym.h>
00026 #include <Motcle.h>
00027 #include <ConstDoubleTab_parts.h>
00028 
00029 Implemente_instanciable(PrecondA,"ssor_bloc",Precond_base);
00030 // 
00031 // printOn et readOn
00032 
00033 Sortie& PrecondA::printOn(Sortie& s ) const
00034 {
00035   return s;
00036 }
00037 
00038 Entree& PrecondA::readOn(Entree& is )
00039 {
00040   Motcle accolade_ouverte("{");
00041   Motcle accolade_fermee("}");
00042   Motcles les_parametres(6);
00043   {
00044     les_parametres[0] = "precond0";
00045     les_parametres[1] = "precond1";
00046     les_parametres[2] = "preconda";
00047     les_parametres[3] = "alpha_0";
00048     les_parametres[4] = "alpha_1";
00049     les_parametres[5] = "alpha_a";
00050     int rang;
00051 
00052     Motcle motlu;
00053     is >> motlu;
00054     if (motlu != accolade_ouverte)
00055       {
00056         Cerr << "Error when reading the parameters of the conjugate gradient PrecondA " << finl;
00057         Cerr << "One expected : " << accolade_ouverte << finl;
00058         exit();
00059       }
00060     is >> motlu;
00061     while (motlu != accolade_fermee)
00062       {
00063         rang = les_parametres.search(motlu);
00064         switch(rang)
00065           {
00066           case 0:
00067             {
00068               is >> le_precond_0;
00069               break;
00070             }
00071           case 1:
00072             {
00073               is >> le_precond_1;
00074               break;
00075             }
00076           case 2:
00077             {
00078               is >> le_precond_a;
00079               break;
00080             }
00081           case 3:
00082             {
00083               is >> alpha_0;
00084               break;
00085             }
00086           case 4:
00087             {
00088               is >> alpha_1;
00089               break;
00090             }
00091           case 5:
00092             {
00093               is >> alpha_a;
00094               break;
00095             }
00096           default :
00097             {
00098               Cerr << "Error when reading the parameters of the preconditioning PrecondA " << finl;
00099               Cerr << "On expected " << les_parametres << " instead of " << motlu << finl;
00100               exit();
00101             }
00102           }
00103         is >> motlu;
00104       }
00105   }
00106   return is;
00107 }
00108 
00109 static void prepare_precond(Precond& p, const Matrice_Base& m, const DoubleVect& v,
00110                             Precond_base::Init_Status status)
00111 {
00112   if (p.non_nul())
00113     {
00114       Precond_base& pp = p.valeur();
00115       pp.reinit(status);
00116       pp.prepare(m, v);
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 void PrecondA::prepare_(const Matrice_Base& m, const DoubleVect& v)
00121 {
00122   Init_Status status = get_status();
00123   const Matrice_Bloc_Sym& matbloc = ref_cast(Matrice_Bloc_Sym, m);
00124   ConstDoubleTab_parts parts(v);
00125   prepare_precond(le_precond_0, matbloc.get_bloc(0,0), parts[0], status);
00126   prepare_precond(le_precond_1, matbloc.get_bloc(1,1), parts[1], status);
00127   if (parts.size() > 2)
00128     prepare_precond(le_precond_a, matbloc.get_bloc(2,2), parts[2], status);
00129   Precond_base::prepare_(m, v);
00130 }
00131 
00132 //
00133 //
00134 //! Calcule la solution du systeme lineaire: A * solution = b<br>avec la methode de relaxation PrecondA.
00135 int PrecondA::preconditionner_(const Matrice_Base& matrice,
00136                                const DoubleVect& b,
00137                                DoubleVect& solution)
00138 {
00139 
00140   double pscb = mp_prodscal(b, b);
00141 
00142   if(pscb<1.e-24)
00143     {
00144       solution=b;
00145       return 1;
00146     }
00147 // On calcule solution = inverse(C)*b avec:
00148 // inverse(C) = inverse((1/w D - E)) *(2-w/w D) * inverse((1/wD -E)t)
00149 // D :partie diagonale des blocs de la matrice
00150 // E :partie triangulaire inferieure des blocs de la matrice
00151   const Matrice_Bloc_Sym& matbloc=ref_cast(Matrice_Bloc_Sym, matrice);
00152   if (matbloc.nb_bloc_lignes()<2
00153       || matbloc.nb_bloc_colonnes()<2
00154       || matbloc.nb_bloc_lignes()!=matbloc.nb_bloc_colonnes())
00155     {
00156       Cerr << "The preconditioning SSOR_BLOC can be used only for symetric block matrixes" << finl;
00157       Cerr << "containing at least 2*2 blocs. For example, when considering the following VEF discretizations :"<< finl;
00158       Cerr << "P0+P1 or P0+Pa or P0+P1+Pa." << finl;
00159       exit();
00160     }
00161   int nblocs=matbloc.nb_bloc_lignes();
00162   const Matrice_Base& A00=matbloc.get_bloc(0,0);
00163   const Matrice_Base& A01=matbloc.get_bloc(0,1);
00164   const Matrice_Base& A11=matbloc.get_bloc(1,1);
00165   const Matrice_Base& A0a=matbloc.get_bloc(0,nblocs-1);
00166   const Matrice_Base& A1a=matbloc.get_bloc(1,nblocs-1);
00167   const Matrice_Base& Aaa=matbloc.get_bloc(nblocs-1,nblocs-1);
00168   DoubleTab_parts parties(solution);
00169   DoubleVect& X0 = parties[0];
00170   DoubleVect& X1 = parties[1];
00171   DoubleVect& Xa = parties[parties.size() - 1];
00172 
00173   DoubleVect F(b);
00174   DoubleTab_parts parties_f(F);
00175   DoubleVect& Y0 = parties_f[0];
00176   DoubleVect& Y1 = parties_f[1];
00177   DoubleVect& Ya = parties_f[parties_f.size() - 1];
00178 
00179 #ifdef TRACE
00180   Cerr << finl << "Y0 " << mp_norme_vect(Y0) << finl;
00181   Cerr << finl << "Y1 " << mp_norme_vect(Y1) << finl;
00182   if(nblocs == 3)
00183     Cerr << finl << "Ya " << mp_norme_vect(Ya) << finl;
00184   matrice.multvect(b, F);
00185   double psc=mp_prodscal(F,b);
00186   assert(psc>0);
00187   double pscF=mp_prodscal(F,F);
00188   Cout << finl <<"cos(angle) no prec " << psc*psc/(pscF*pscb) << finl;
00189   Cout << finl <<"(F,b) " << psc << finl;
00190   Cout << finl <<"(b,b) " << pscb << finl;
00191   Cout << finl <<"(F,F) " << pscF << finl;
00192   F.ajoute(-psc/pscb,b,VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00193 
00194   Cout << finl <<"(F0,F0) " << mp_prodscal(Y0,Y0) << finl;
00195   Cout << finl <<"(F1,F1) " << mp_prodscal(Y1,Y1) << finl;
00196   if(nblocs == 3)
00197     Cout << finl <<"(Fa,Fa) " << mp_prodscal(Ya,Ya) << finl;
00198   F=b;
00199 #endif
00200 
00201 // Descente :
00202 
00203   le_precond_1.preconditionner(A11,Y1,X1);
00204   operator_multiply(X1, -alpha_1, VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00205   A11.ajouter_multvect(X1, Y1);
00206   A01.ajouter_multvect(X1, Y0);
00207   if(nblocs == 3)
00208     A1a.ajouter_multvectT(X1, Ya);
00209   operator_multiply(X1, -1, VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00210   le_precond_0.preconditionner(A00,Y0,X0);
00211   operator_multiply(X0, -alpha_0, VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00212   A00.ajouter_multvect(X0, Y0);
00213   A01.ajouter_multvectT(X0, Y1);
00214   if(nblocs == 3)
00215     A0a.ajouter_multvectT(X0, Ya);
00216   operator_multiply(X0, -1, VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00217   if(nblocs == 3)
00218     {
00219       le_precond_a.preconditionner(Aaa,Ya,Xa);
00220       operator_multiply(Xa, -alpha_a, VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00221       Aaa.ajouter_multvect(Xa, Ya);
00222       A1a.ajouter_multvect(Xa, Y1);
00223       A0a.ajouter_multvect(Xa, Y0);
00224       operator_multiply(Xa, -1, VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00225     }
00226 // X contient S,
00227   F=solution;
00228 // Diagonale :
00229 
00230   A11.multvect(Y1,X1);
00231   operator_multiply(X1, 1./alpha_1, VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00232   A00.multvect(Y0,X0);
00233   operator_multiply(X0, 1./alpha_0, VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00234   if(nblocs == 3)
00235     {
00236       Aaa.multvect(Ya,Xa);
00237       operator_multiply(Xa, 1./alpha_a, VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00238     }
00239 // X contient T,
00240   F=solution;
00241 
00242 // Remontee :
00243 
00244   if(nblocs == 3)
00245     {
00246       le_precond_a.preconditionner(Aaa,Ya,Xa);
00247       operator_multiply(Xa, -alpha_a, VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00248       Aaa.ajouter_multvect(Xa, Ya);
00249       A1a.ajouter_multvect(Xa, Y1);
00250       A0a.ajouter_multvect(Xa, Y0);
00251       operator_multiply(Xa, -1., VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00252     }
00253   le_precond_0.preconditionner(A00,Y0,X0);
00254   operator_multiply(X0, -alpha_0, VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00255   A00.ajouter_multvect(X0, Y0);
00256   A01.ajouter_multvectT(X0, Y1);
00257   if(nblocs == 3)
00258     A0a.ajouter_multvectT(X0, Ya);
00259   operator_multiply(X0, -1., VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00260   le_precond_1.preconditionner(A11,Y1,X1);
00261   operator_multiply(X1, -alpha_1, VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00262   A11.ajouter_multvect(X1, Y1);
00263   A01.ajouter_multvect(X1, Y0);
00264   if(nblocs == 3)
00265     A1a.ajouter_multvectT(X1, Ya);
00266   operator_multiply(X1, -1., VECT_ALL_ITEMS);
00267 #ifdef TRACE
00268   matrice.multvect(solution, F);
00269   psc=mp_prodscal(F,b);
00270   assert(psc>0);
00271   pscF=mp_prodscal(F,F);
00272   Cout << finl <<"cos(angle) " << psc*psc/(pscF*pscb) << finl;
00273   Cout << finl <<"(F,b) " << psc << finl;
00274   Cout << finl <<"(b,b) " << pscb << finl;
00275   Cout << finl <<"(F,F) " << pscF << finl;
00276   F.ajoute(-psc/pscb,b);
00277 
00278   Cout << finl <<"(F0,F0) " << mp_prodscal(Y0,Y0) << finl;
00279   Cout << finl <<"(F1,F1) " << mp_prodscal(Y1,Y1) << finl;
00280   if(nblocs == 3)
00281     Cout << finl <<"(Fa,Fa) " << mp_prodscal(Ya,Ya) << finl;
00282 #endif
00283 
00284   return 1;
00285 }
